description: Details submitted pursuant to reference 24/00621/FUL: sports hall (11) in respect of demolition of 5 no. blocks (EFAA, EFAB, EFAD, EFAE and EFAF), consequential works to retained building EFAC, construction of a three-storey replacement school building and separate sports block, relocation of playing fields and parking area along with access, landscaping, and associated infrastructure.
